POSTPARTUM_OGTT.pattern: ((75\s*g|75g)?.{0,80}?(ogtt|oral glucose tolerance test).{0,200}?(6\s*weeks|4\s*-\s*12\s*weeks|6\s*weeks\s*or\s*more).{0,200}?(after delivery|postpartum|after giving birth))|((after delivery|postpartum|after giving birth).{0,200}?(75\s*g|75g)?.{0,80}?(ogtt|oral glucose tolerance test).{0,200}?(6\s*weeks|4\s*-\s*12\s*weeks|6\s*weeks\s*or\s*more))

REQUIRES_COMPENSATION.pattern: (insulin resistance|decreased insulin sensitivity|reduced insulin sensitivity).*(compensat|adapt|beta[- ]cell|insulin secretion)
